mapper.select: SELECT t2.industry_name AS name,SUM(COALESCE(t3.number,0)) AS value FROM (SELECT id,industry FROM t_w_use_water_unit WHERE node_code = #{nodeCode} AND deleted='0' )t1 INNER JOIN (SELECT id,industry_name FROM t_w_quota_info WHERE deleted='0' )t2 ON t1.industry=t2.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT sum(COALESCE (water_number,0)) AS number,use_water_unit_id,use_year FROM t_w_water_use_data WHERE use_year =#{year} GROUP BY use_water_unit_id,use_year )t3 ON t1.id=t3.use_water_unit_id GROUP BY t2.industry_name
